name: challengec05
description: * Interact with the API for books which provide information of the books * Use the endpoint: https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=isbn:9781451648546, to get book information * Create the model in JSON file to use as mocked data * Start building the main layout for the site in a normal index.html file using SCSS and js to get the first prototype of the app with mocked data * Create homepage of the bookstore app * Create book preview page * Create reservation process interface * Finally, add into your GIT repo and push all the new elements

scripts.start: npm run compileSass && npm run buildWebpack && npm run server

author: Alejandro Taborda
